meanings.definition: Used as an informal affirmative response.
meanings.sent1: Yessum, I will do my homework right away!
meanings.sent2: She asked if I wanted ice cream, and I said, 'Yessum!'
meanings.sent3: When the teacher asked if we were ready for the test, we all shouted 'Yessum!'
meanings.sent4: The crowd cheered, 'Yessum,' as the team scored the winning goal.
meanings.sent5: With a big smile, he replied, 'Yessum,' to the invitation.

meanings.definition: Used to show agreement or compliance.
meanings.sent1: Yessum, I agree with your plan.
meanings.sent2: If you need help, just say 'Yessum,' and I'll be there.
meanings.sent3: When asked to clean his room, he sighed and mumbled, 'Yessum.'
meanings.sent4: The team captain nodded and said, 'Yessum,' to the coach's instructions.
meanings.sent5: With a nod, she replied, 'Yessum,' to the proposal.
